alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Frontier; Grant; Hayes; Lincoln; McPherson; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 1:57PM CST until January 13 at 6:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Additional new snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle, southwest and west central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Saturday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Arthur; Frontier; Grant; Hayes; Lincoln; McPherson; Sheridan
